languages.text: {n}Металл поддается и, словно глина, вбирает лезвие. Вытащить обратно его не удается — клинок навеки застыл в ксеносском монументе, знаменуя собой триумф вашего упорства.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}В ответ на ровное медленное давление металл поддается и, словно глина, вбирает в себя лезвие. Вытащить обратно вам его не удается — клинок навеки застыл в ксеноссом монументе, знаменуя собой триумф вашего упорства.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The metal yields and takes in your blade as clay would. You try to pull it out, but to no avail. Forever stuck inside the xenos monument, the blade itself now is a glorious monument to your stubbornness.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Металл поддается и, словно глина, вбирает лезвие. Вытащить обратно его не удается — клинок навеки застыл в ксеносском монументе, знаменуя собой триумф вашего упорства.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The metal yields and takes in your blade, as clay would. You try to pull it out but to no avail. Forever stuck inside the xenos monument, the blade is itself a glorious monument to your persistence.{/n}

{n}The metal yields and takes in your blade, as clay would. You try to pull it out but to no avail. Forever stuck inside the xenos monument, the blade is itself a glorious monument to your persistence.{/n}

{n}The metal yields and takes in your blade, as clay would. You try to pull it out but to no avail. Forever stuck inside the xenos monument, the blade itself now is a glorious monument to your persistence.{/n}

{n}The metal yields and takes in your blade as clay would. You try to pull it out, but to no avail. Forever stuck inside the xenos monument, the blade itself now is a glorious monument to your stubbornness.{/n}

{n}The metal yields and takes in your blade as clay would. You try to pull it out, but to no avail. Forever stuck inside the xenos monument, the blade itself now is a glorious monument to your stubbornness.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El metal cede y absorbe tu hoja como lo haría la arcilla. Intentas sacarlo, pero es en vano. Atascado eternamente en el monumento xenos, el cuchillo es ahora un monumento glorioso a tu obstinación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The metal yields and takes in your blade as clay would. You try to pull it out, but to no avail. Forever stuck inside the xenos monument, the blade itself now is a glorious monument to your stubbornness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El metal cede y absorbe tu hoja como lo haría la arcilla. Intentas sacarlo, pero es en vano. Atascado eternamente en el monumento xenos, el cuchillo es ahora un monumento glorioso a tu testarudez.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le métal cède et avale votre lame aussi aisément que de l'argile. Vous essayez de la retirer, en vain. Coincée à jamais dans le monument xénos, elle illustre désormais votre ténacité.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The metal yields and takes in your blade as clay would. You try to pull it out, but to no avail. Forever stuck inside the xenos monument, the blade itself now is a glorious monument to your stubbornness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le métal cède et avale votre lame aussi aisément que de l'argile. Vous essayez de la retirer, en vain. Coincée à jamais dans le monument xénos, elle illustre désormais votre persévérance.{/n}

languages.text: {n}その金属は、まるで土であるかのようにあなたの剣を飲み込み、包み込む。引き抜こうとしたが無駄だった。荘厳な異種族の記念碑に永遠に取り込まれ、あなたの頑固さを示す記念碑の一部になってしまった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The metal yields and takes in your blade as clay would. You try to pull it out, but to no avail. Forever stuck inside the xenos monument, the blade itself now is a glorious monument to your stubbornness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その金属は、まるで土であるかのようにあなたの剣を飲み込み、包み込む。引き抜こうとしたが無駄だった。荘厳な異種族の記念碑に永遠に取り込まれ、あなたの頑固さを示す記念碑の一部になってしまった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}金属不断变形，像沼泽一样牢牢地吸住了你的刀。你试图将它拔出来，但无济于事。如今，这把刀被永远地困在了异形金属之中，仿佛纪念碑一样，昭示着你的冥顽不灵。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The metal yields and takes in your blade as clay would. You try to pull it out, but to no avail. Forever stuck inside the xenos monument, the blade itself now is a glorious monument to your stubbornness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}金属不断变形，像沼泽一样牢牢地吸住了你的刀。你试图将它拔出来，但无济于事。如今，这把刀被永远地困在了异形金属之中，仿佛纪念碑一样，昭示着你坚持不懈的精神。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Metall gibt nach und nimmt deine Klinge auf, wie Lehm es tun würde. Du versuchst, sie herauszuziehen, doch vergebens. Die Klinge selbst, für immer in dem Xenos-Monument feststeckend, ist nun ein glorreiches Monument deiner Sturheit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The metal yields and takes in your blade as clay would. You try to pull it out, but to no avail. Forever stuck inside the xenos monument, the blade itself now is a glorious monument to your stubbornness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Metall gibt nach und nimmt deine Klinge auf, wie Lehm es tun würde. Du versuchst, sie herauszuziehen, doch vergebens. Die Klinge selbst, für immer in dem Xenos-Monument feststeckend, ist nun ein glorreiches Monument deiner Hartnäckigkeit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Metal direnmiyor ve bıçağını kilmişçesine içine alıyor. Geri çekmeye çalışıyorsun ama başaramıyorsun. Zeno anıtının içinde kalan bıçak, inadının görkemli bir anıtına dönüşüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The metal yields and takes in your blade as clay would. You try to pull it out, but to no avail. Forever stuck inside the xenos monument, the blade itself now is a glorious monument to your stubbornness.{/n}
